freePlanFeature1: View 3 technical/sentiment analyses and the latest command suggestions without including recent history
freePlanFeature4: Basic assessment of market conditions from manager at the beginning of the day
freePlanFeature5: Receive notifications about major market changes
premiumPlanFeature1: Unlimited access to analysis history (command suggestions, technical and sentiment analysis)
premiumPlanFeature2: Unlimited time, chat support with both low and high-level managers
premiumPlanFeature3: View full detailed content and source links
premiumPlanFeature4: View detailed assessments and action plans from managers, multiple updates throughout the day
premiumPlanFeature5: Push notifications about potential opportunities and risks as soon as they are detected
